name: 楊濠瞬
objective:
瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，2.拉普拉斯 (Laplace)變換及其在電路上之應用，3.向量分析及其在電磁學上之應用。
Understanding the theory and applications of differential equations including the solving methods, Laplace transformation in electric circuits, and vector analysis in electricity and magnetism applications.
schedule:
Week 1: Course Overview
Week 2: First-Order Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs)
Week 3: Separable ODEs
Week 4: Exact ODEs
Week 5: Linear ODEs
Week 6: Second-Order Linear ODEs
Week 7: Homogeneous Linear ODEs
Week 8: Systems of ODEs
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Higher Order Linear ODEs
Week 11: Nonhomogeneous ODEs
Week 12: Qualitative Methods
Week 13: Laplace Transforms
Week 14: Transforms of Derivatives and Integrals
Week 15: Unit Step Function
Week 16: Convolution
Week 17: Partial Differetial equations
Week 18: Final
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam 期中考 40%
Final Exam 期末考 60%
materials: Erwin Kreyszig, Advanced Engineering Mathematics: 10th Edition, Wiley
